title: Marbles: Frontiers of Mor(t)ality
description: The Boston Globe's Alex Beam says: "I read most of this book in one sitting, and loved it!"Marbles, the singular memoir by Bob Biederman, sub- titled Frontiers of Mortality is a collection of 21 unforgettable and extravagantly diverse personal experiences. Biederman examines life at inception, at death, and the many moral choices in between. His bag of Marbles focus on family relationships, their evolution and devolution as well as a few comic moments that reflect some of the absurdity in our judgment.
